# Sajid Sabreen - Product Visionary & Systems Builder

> I build systems that turn complexity into flow.

## AI Agent Navigation
- **Full Portfolio Content**: [llms-full.txt](llms-full.txt)
- **Main Website**: [https://sajidsabreen.netlify.app/](https://sajidsabreen.netlify.app/)

## Summary
Sajid Sabreen is a Product Visionary and Systems Builder specializing in behavioral AI, operations, and scalable systems. He has built solutions across finance, medical, and telecommunications industries, focusing on automation, clarity, and rapid execution.

## Key Projects
- **Digital Scan**: Behavioral AI Engine
- **Discovery SDK**: Embeddable Behavioral Module
- **Gene Facilitate**: AI Behavioral Conversation Engine
- **Watchdog System**: 120+ Endpoint Monitoring
- **Operational Automation Suite**: 90% Workflow Automation
